title: Chris Cuomo Addresses COVID-19 Diagnosis: 'Scary... I Can't Go Hug My Kids' - Getaka.co.in
description: Chris Cuomo Addresses COVID-19 Diagnosis: 'Scary... I Can't Go Hug My Kids' Getaka.co.in CNN anchor Chris Cuomo diagnosed with coronavirus; he will continue working from home CNN Chris Cuomo reveals his biggest fear after positive test for Covid-19 CNN Medica…
content:
CNN’s Chris Cuomo addressed his coronavirus diagnosis on Tuesday night as he continued to anchor Cuomo Prime Time from the basement of his home.
